text: The Church of St. Nicholas () is a Serbian Orthodox church built from 1902 to 1909 in the city of Kotor. On that place the Orthodox Church existed from 1810 to the Christmas Eve in 1896, when it was burnt down in fire. ==References== * Митрополија/Слава цркве Светог Николе у Котору Category:Serbian Orthodox church buildings in Montenegro Category:Tourist attractions in Kotor Category:Churches completed in 1909
title: Church of St. Nicholas, Kotor
